Function Documentation

void NutIgmpInput (  NUTDEVICE *  dev,
NETBUF *  nb
) 
 

Process incoming IGMP packets.

Parameters:
dev Identifies the device that received the packet.
nb Pointer to a network buffer structure containing the IGMP packet.

int NutIgmpOutput (  u_char  type,
u_long  dest,
NETBUF *  nb
) 
 

Send an IGMP datagram.

Known IGMP types are:

  • IGMP_MEMBERSHIP_QUERY Membership query.
  • IGMP_V1_MEMBERSHIP_REPORT Version 1 membership report.
  • IGMP_V2_MEMBERSHIP_REPORT Version 2 membership report.
  • IGMP_V2_LEAVE_GROUP Leave-group message.

Parameters:
type IGMP packet type.
dest Destination IP address.
nb Network buffer structure containing the datagram.
Returns:
0 on success, -1 otherwise.
